doc.text: In/IN my/PRP$ attempt/NN to/TO find/VB the/DT ultimate/JJ Briyani/NN ,/, I/PRP stumbled/VBD upon/IN this/DT Arabic/JJ restaurant/NN where/WRB they/PRP serve/VBP a/DT Yemenese/NN Rice/NN called/VBD Mandi/NN ./. The/DT waitress/NN said/JJ that/IN this/DT was/VBD like/IN the/DT Arabic/NN version/NN of/IN Briyani/NN ./. I/PRP guess/VB she/PRP meant/VB that/IN it/PRP was/VBD flavored/JJ Basmati/NN Rice/NN ./. Mandi/PRP is/VBZ supposed/JJ to/TO be/VB cooked/VBN in/IN a/DT tanoor/JJ -LRB-/NN not/RB to/TO be/VB confused/VBD with/IN tandoor/JJ -RRB-/NN which/WDT is/VBZ essentially/RB a/DT hole/NN in/IN the/DT ground/JJ lined/NN by/IN clay/NN with/IN firewood/NN at/IN the/DT bottom/NN ./. The/DT rice/NN and/CC meat/NN is/VBZ then/RB suspended/JJ over/IN the/DT embers/NN in/IN a/DT net/NN for/IN hours/NNS to/TO slow/JJ cook/VB ./. I/PRP seriously/RB doubt/VBD that/IN they/PRP have/VBP a/DT real/JJ tanoor/NN in/IN the/DT restaurant/NN but/CC I/PRP could/VB be/VB wrong/JJ ./. Anyway/NNP at/IN $/$ 24/CD dollars/NNS per/RB serving/VBG ,/, I/PRP really/RB wanted/VBD to/TO see/VB if/IN this/DT ``/JJ Briyani/NN ''/NN can/MD be/VB that/WDT great/JJ !/. The/DT Lamb/NNP Shank/NNP is/VBZ roasted/JJ till/NN it/PRP is/VBZ crispy/JJ and/CC all/RB the/DT fibers/NNS have/VBP separated/VBN off/IN the/DT sinews/NN ./. It/PRP 's/VBZ almost/RB like/IN Jerky/NN but/CC not/RB quite/RB ./. I/PRP found/VBD the/DT crispy/NN lamb/NN very/RB tasty/JJ though/IN I/PRP felt/VBD the/DT rice/NN was/VBD a/DT bit/NN too/RB soft/JJ ./. The/DT texture/NN was/VBD not/RB what/WP I/PRP expect/VB of/IN perfectly/JJ steamed/JJ Basmati/NN ./. Flavourwise/JJ ,/, it/PRP had/VBD a/DT floral/NN fragrance/NN as/IN Rose/NNP Water/NNP was/VBD used/VBN in/IN the/DT cooking/NN process/NN ./. This/DT being/NN my/PRP$ first/JJ time/NN eating/VBG this/DT particular/JJ dish/NN ,/, I/PRP ca/MD n't/RB really/RB tell/VB you/PRP whether/CC it/PRP is/VBZ really/RB good/JJ since/IN I/PRP do/VBP n't/RB have/VB any/RB gold/RB standard/JJ to/TO compare/VB it/PRP to/TO ./. Perhaps/RB our/JJ Arabic/NN experts/NN can/MD enlighted/VB us/PRP ?/. Bread/JJ and/CC dip/VB can/MD be/VB a/DT very/RB satisfying/JJ meal/NN when/WRB done/VBN right/NN ./. The/DT Hommus/NN here/RB lacks/VBZ the/DT strong/JJ chickpea/NN and/CC tahini/NN taste/NN which/WDT I/PRP enjoyed/VBN ./. But/CC it/PRP was/VBD still/RB quite/RB satisfying/JJ nonetheless/NN ,/, when/WRB eaten/VBD with/IN the/DT freshly/JJ baked/VBD bread/NNS ./. What/WP was/VBD really/RB good/JJ was/VBD the/DT grilled/VBN vegetables/NNS ./. The/DT carrots/NNS were/VBD wonderfully/RB caramelised/VBN and/CC sweet/JJ which/WDT complemented/VBD the/DT savoury/NN dips/NN very/RB well/RB ./. Something/DT new/JJ for/IN me/PRP ./. Quite/JJ enjoyable/NN ,/, though/CC I/PRP think/VB a/DT $/$ 2.50/CD Briyani/NN can/MD buy/VB me/PRP more/JJR satisfaction/IN 10/CD times/NNS over/IN ./.
